akn:section.akn:heading: Demonstration program to integrate quality improvement and patient safety training into clinical edu

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary may award grants to eligible entities or consortia under this section to carry out demonstration projects to develop and implement academic curricula that integrates 11 So in original. Probably should be “integrate”. quality improvement and patient safety in the clinical education of health professionals. Such awards shall be made on a competitive basis and pursuant to peer review.
